Sentence.sentence: That statement comes not, as you might imagine, from a stereotypical tree-hugging, save-the-world greenie ( ' ,  环保主义者), but from Gordon Brown, a politician with a reputation for rigour, thoroughness and above all, caution.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Imagine how intimidating it be for prospective students unfamiliar with the complexities of higher education to navigate this kind of information and then identify which schools are the best fit.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Our brains respond better to difficulty than we imagine
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: You can imagine similar kinds of interactive activities along historical lines," like following the Freedom Trail in Boston, Professor Dede said.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is almost impossible to imagine our society without thinking of the extraordinary achievements of scientists and engineers in building our complicated world.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But try to imagine our world as well without the remarkable works that have defined our culture and values
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As much as I enjoy my own company, I no longer imagine I can get through a single day much less all my life completely on my own.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I imagine that what my parents were trying to teach me was to take responsibilities for my actions and my choices
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But the teaching was shaped by our cultural imagines.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And I'd imagine you would be doing quire a lot of teaching outside the school, and moving around quite a bit.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "I can't imagine if there's any other acting job in the world where you don't know what show you're in, when you're hired," says voice actor Keythe Farley, who chairs the SAG-AFTRA negotiating committee.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Now, imagine the same dinner, but instead of checking their phone, the person belches—loudly.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: That statement comes not, as you might imagine, from a stereotypical tree-hugging, save-the-world greenie 环保主义者, but from Gordon Brown, a politician with a reputation for rigour, thoroughness and above all, caution.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The results of her decades worth of careful observations were detailed paintings and descriptions of European insects, followed by unconventional visuals and stories of insects and animals from a land that most at the time could only imagine.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Try to imagine your life being illiterate.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: When people imagine themselves as advisers and imagine their own choices as belonging to someone else, they feel less tired and rely less on decision shortcuts to make those choices.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均可表示"在思想中形成一个看法或观念"之意。
means: think ： 最普通用词，指想或思索，也指由反复思考而作出判断或得出结论等。
conceive ： 指在头脑中组织好自己的思想，在心中形成一个系统的思想或一个见解。
imagine比conceive更强调形象思维，指在头脑中形成一个清晰明确的意象。
fancy与imagine略不同，往往指的是不切实际的，属于梦幻般的想象。
realize ： 指领悟，通过生动的构思或想象从而抓住事物的本质。

stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine[v.想象,设想,料想]+able可以……的→adj.可想像到的,可能的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 富有想象力的,爱想象的
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine[v.想象,设想,料想]+ative表形容词→adj.富有想象力的,爱想象的
imag相象,模仿+ine→v.想象,设想,料想

Sentence.sentence: After ten years of living in one, I can't imagine ever living in a small town again.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: As you can imagine, the trip is no piece of cake.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: But he said that they were all nice people and he couldn't imagine any of them had done that.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: But it is useful to bear in mind that all such changes come from the technology and not some imagined desire by parents to keep their children under their wings.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Charles darwin, over 150 years ago, imagined a world far busier, noisier and more intimate (亲密的) than the world we can see and hear.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Consider again the cell-phone, and imagine the mines that produced those metals, the factories needed to make the box and packaging (包装) It came in.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Imagine a child standing on a diving board four feet high and asking himself the question: Should I jump?
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Imagine my surprise when I stepped foot onto UCR's campus, where over 400 organizations exist, ranging from political organizations to karate club.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Imagine the anxiety if you do not want to be considered unpunctual.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Imagine you are a student and you share a flat with another student who you think isn't doing her share of the housework.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语福建卷 短文填词 原文

Sentence.sentence: In 1928, Herbert Hoover imagined an America with "a chicken in every pot and a car in every garage".
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: So imagine my delight when he emailed me saying he wanted to come to visit me.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: When most people think of the arts, they imagine the end product, the beautiful painting, a wonderful piece of music, or an award-winning performance in the theater.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 填空题 原文

Sentence.sentence: When the music started, the room was filled with the most beautiful tones and musical colors I could have ever imagined.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: It is difficult to the point of impossibility for the average reader under the age of forty to imagine a time when high-quality arts criticism could be found in most big-city newspapers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It’s hard to imagine that many people are dumb enough to want children just because Reese and Angelina make it look so glamorous: most adults understand that a baby is not a haircut.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: This is because the networked computer has sparked a secret war between downloading and uploading - between passive consumption and active creation - whose outcome will shape our collective future in ways we can only begin to imagine.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In the 2006 film version of The Devil Wears Prada ,Miranda Priestly, played by Meryl Streep, scolds her unattractive assistant for imagining that high fashion doesn’t affect her, Priestly explains how the deep blue color of the assistant’s sweater descended over the years from fashion shows to departments stores and to the bargain bin in which the poor girl doubtless found her garment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Imagine that you favor increasing the minimum wage in our state, and I do not.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

Sentence.sentence: Imagine you are pouring your heart out to someone and they are just busy on their phone, and if you ask for their attention you get the response "I can multitask".
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: It's hard to imagine that many people are dumb enough to want children just because Reese and Angelina make it look so glamorous: most adults understand that a baby is not a haircut.
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: It's not hard to imagine a similar reversal happening in London.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: It's not hard to imagine that local culture and sentiment would help shape how executives think about the future. "It surely seems plausible that happy people would be more forward-thinking and creative and lean towards R&D more than the average," said on
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Some imagine that the coming work-free world will be defined by inequality.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: We need them to imagine the United States as a place where they can be productive for a while without committing themselves to staying forever.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: I can imagine the scene clearly in my mind.
sentences.cn: 我可以清楚地想像出那个情景。

sentences.en: I cannot imagine what to do in this dreadful situation.
sentences.cn: 我不能想像在这么糟的情况下该怎么办。

sentences.en: I can't imagine lying like that. I would go crazy.
sentences.cn: 我无法想像那样躺着的情形, 我会发疯的。

sentences.en: You don't imagine it is true.
sentences.cn: 你别想像那是真的。

sentences.en: He imagined himself as manager of the company.
sentences.cn: 他把自己想像为公司的经理。

sentences.en: There's nobody following us—you're just imagining it!
sentences.cn: 没有人跟着我们——你只不过是猜想而已。

sentences.en: I don't imagine they will come if it rains.
sentences.cn: 我认为天如果下雨, 他们是不会来的。

sentences.en: They imagined your ship wrecked.
sentences.cn: 他们以为你的船遇难了。

sentences.en: He is always imagining dangers that don't exist.
sentences.cn: 他总是想着那些其实并不存在的危险。

sentences.en: I imagine she was pretty annoyed when she found out.
sentences.cn: 我想她发现此事后一定很生气。

sentences.en: “Does she know what kind of tablets she's taken today?”“I imagine so.
sentences.cn: ”“她知道今天她吃了什么药了吗?”“我想她知道。”

sentence.cn: 在一个人生活了十年之后，我无法想象再在一个小镇上过生活。
sentence.en: After ten years of living in one,  I can't imagine ever living in a small town again.
sentence.from: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

sentence.cn: 但是他说他们都是好人，他无法想象他们中的任何一个做过这事。
sentence.en: But he said that they were all nice people and he couldn’t imagine any of them had done that.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

entry.def: If you imagine something, you think about it and your mind forms a picture or idea of it.

example.ex: He could not imagine a more peaceful scene...
example.tran: 他想象不出比这更祥和的景象。

example.ex: She couldn't imagine living in a place like that...
example.tran: 她无法想象住在那样一个地方。

entry.def: If you imagine that something is the case, you think that it is the case.

example.ex: I imagine you're referring to Jean-Paul Sartre...
example.tran: 我猜你说的是让－保罗·萨特。

example.ex: We tend to imagine that the Victorians were very prim and proper...
example.tran: 我们往往认为维多利亚时代的人们都一本正经,谨言慎行。

entry.def: If you imagine something, you think that you have seen, heard, or experienced that thing, although actually you have not.

example.ex: I realised that I must have imagined the whole thing.
example.tran: 我意识到大概整件事都是我臆想出来的。

means.word_mean: 1. form a mental image of something that is not present or that is not the case;

sentences.sentence: "Can you conceive of him as the president?"
"I imagine she earned a lot of money with her new novel"
"I thought to find her in a bad state"
"he didn't think to find her in the kitchen"
"I guess she is angry at me for standing her up"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French imaginer, from Latin imaginare 'form an image of, represent' and imaginari 'picture to oneself', both from imago, imagin- 'image'

sentences.en: He's always imagining (that) we're talking about him behind his back.

sentences.en: Can you imagine what it must be like to lose your job after 20 years?

sentences.en: Don't imagine you can get anything out of it.

sentences.en: One can imagine how regretful he was.

sentences.cn: 我认为天如果下雨,他们是不会来的.
sentences.en: I don't imagine they will come if it rains.

sentences.cn: 天天生活在城市里的我们很难想像过去的人,过去的事, 过去的年代与感觉.
sentences.en: In the hubbub of city life, it is hard for us to imagine the people and the things of the past, and how indeed these people felt about the world.

sentences.en: You can imagine the situation there.

sentences.cn: 我无法想像那样躺着的情形, 我会发疯的.
sentences.en: I can't imagine lying like that. I would go crazy.

sentences.cn: 他们丝毫不受恐怖主义思潮的影响,这你可以想像到的.
sentences.en: They were as far removed from the ethos of terrorism as you could imagine.

sentences.cn: 闭上眼睛，设想自己在森林里。

sentences.cn: 我现在无法设想没有了孩子们的生活。
sentences.en: I can't imagine life without the children now.

sentences.cn: 这些结果表明，提前通过好奇心设想接下来的结果，可以帮助觉得某些事是否值得努力去做
sentences.en: These results suggest that imagining the outcome of following through on one's curiosity ahead of time can help determine whether it is worth the endeavor.

sentences.cn: 当我开始阅读关于科学家、经济学家和哲学家的故事时，我开始设想自己处于他们的位置。
sentences.en: As I began to read about scientists, economists, and philosophers, I started imagining myself in their shoes.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 当 Harper 躺在医院里进行康复治疗时，他设想出了一种产品 —— 美味又健康的冷冻食品。
sentences.en: As he lay in the hospital recovering, Harper imagined a line of healthy frozen foods that tasted good.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 设想一下,再过130年,手机不知又会出现哪些用途呢!
sentences.en: Imagine what our phones able to do in another 130 years'time!

sentences.cn: 大家不妨设想一下这样的情景:将一根枝条插进动物的洞穴里.
sentences.en: Imagine you are poking a stick into an animal's burrow.

sentences.cn: 设想她处于你的地位, 她会怎么办?
sentences.en: Imagine her to be in your place, how would she act?

sentences.cn: 我设想这里的每一个人心中都在想;他的病拖不过这个冬季.
sentences.en: I imagine every one here thought he could not get through the winter.

sentences.cn: 正如你所设想的,这里的有些习性与在家里的相差很远.
sentences.en: As you can imagine are really different form the way there are at home.

sentences.cn: 设想你们全都被催眠了,以为屋子里有一只老虎.
sentences.en: Imagine all of you are hypnotized to believe there is a tiger in this room.

sentences.cn: 然后对进一步的研究工作提出了建议和设想.
sentences.en: Then advised and imagined further research work.

sentences.cn: 设想一下,如果一个木桶没有底板或者底板不坚实, 结果必然是竹篮打水一场空.
sentences.en: Imagine if a wooden floor or no floor is not solid, the results must be empty.

sentences.cn: 设想一个博物馆最近得到了霍皮印第安人的一个克奇纳神偶像.
sentences.en: Imagine that a museum has just acquired a Hopi Kachina doll.

sentences.cn: 我尽力设想.
sentences.en: I would try to imagine.

sentences.cn: 并且我们也不应该这样设想, 但是这确实是一个很有用的工具.
sentences.en: And we should not imagine that it is. But it is a very useful tool.

sentences.cn: 上月, 我写了一篇有关设想一个国家的信贷犯罪化的内幕新闻报道.
sentences.en: Last month, I wrote a thought piece about imagining a nation where credit was criminalized.

sentences.cn: 设想一下,你创办了一家公司,并希望公开上市.
sentences.en: Imagine that you have founded a company and want to take it public.

sentences.cn: 设想一下我们的星系就像一粒红色的葡萄处在橙色的果冻(宇宙)中.
sentences.en: Imagine our galaxy as a red grape in the orange jelly of the universe.

sentences.cn: 你能设想一下500万人整日挂在网上无所事事 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can you imagine 5 million people hanging around online with nothing at all to do?

sentences.cn: 我记得以前,设想自己的人生会使怎样.
sentences.en: I remember once imagining what my life would be like.

sentences.cn: 但我没有停止过去设想这个送花的人是谁.
sentences.en: But I never stopped imagining who the giver might be.

sentences.cn: 过去有些人设想像鸟儿一样飞翔.
sentences.en: In the past, some people imagined to fly like a bird.

sentences.cn: 设想,一个巨大的场地上全是光电太阳能板在吸收光能.
sentences.en: Imagine giant fields filled with photovoltaic solar panels, soaking up rays.

sentences.cn: 我设想另外一种在我的公寓前遭遇歹徒的情景.
sentences.en: I imagine another confrontation in front of my apartment.

sentences.cn: 设想一下你身处荒岛的情形.
sentences.en: Imagine yourself to be a desert island.

sentences.cn: 比如设想感冒或者是毒葛的攻击都可能导致持久的高烧.
sentences.en: Imagine a cold or an attack of poison oak that would last forever.

sentences.cn: 设想自己是唐小姐, 用她的眼睛来审定着衣镜里自己的仪表.
sentences.en: Imagining he were Miss Tang, he judged his appearance in the mirror through her eyes.

sentences.cn: 朋友告诉你缺点, 请设想他和盘托出.
sentences.en: If a friend tells a fault, imagine always that he has not told the whole.

sentences.cn: 我猜测他从出生起就 这么 邪恶了, 这个事情设想起来很可怕.
sentences.en: I imagine he's evil from birth, which is a terrible thing to imagine.

sentences.cn: 你永远无法想像的残酷, 一部挑战人性极限的恐怖电影.
sentences.en: You can never imagine the cruelty, a challenge to the limits of human horror movie.

sentences.en: Imagine if I had sent that hooker like I was gonna?

sentences.en: He imagined himself as manager of the company.

sentences.en: I can imagine skiing through deep snow on a cold morning.

sentences.en: Close your eyes and imagine waking up to a perfect day.

sentences.cn: 不少人想像计算机是一个很大的加法机器.
sentences.en: Many people imagine that a computer is a very large adding machine.

sentences.cn: 很难想像得出更温馨的分手画面.
sentences.en: A more cordial separation is hard to imagine.

sentences.cn: 你将目睹超乎想像的奇迹.
sentences.en: You will see wonders beyond imagining.

sentences.cn: 可以想像他是多么懊悔.
sentences.en: One can imagine how regretful he was.

sentences.cn: 你别想像那是真的.
sentences.en: You don't imagine it is true.

sentences.en: It is hard to imagine a student focusing energy on textbook while other children are playing.

sentences.cn: 想像太阳的光明 、 晴朗 、 毫无障碍和自然放现, 心性的相就像太阳.
sentences.en: Imagine a sun, luminous, clear, unobstructed , and spontaneously present; its nature is like this.

sentences.en: The thong bikini offered the scantiest coverage yet imagined in the rear of the suit.

sentences.en: Fabrication of war records and bogus claims of bravery are more widespread than imagined.

sentences.cn: 这房子跟我们想像的一样美.
sentences.en: The house is as beautiful as we imagine.

sentences.cn: 天天生活在城市里的我们很难想像过去的人,过去的事, 过去的年代与感觉.
sentences.en: In the hubbub of city life, it is hard for us to imagine the people and the things of the past, and how indeed these people felt about the world.

sentences.cn: 未来似乎随着他的想像无限延伸.
sentences.en: The future seemed to stretch away as far as he could imagine.

sentences.cn: 将用户想像成非常聪明但非常忙的人.
sentences.en: Imagine users as very intelligent but very busy.

sentences.cn: 我难以想像生活在这样一个地方.
sentences.en: I cant imagine living in such a place.

sentences.cn: 这个仪式与你所能想像的英国圣公会的仪式完全不一样.
sentences.en: It was about as different to a Church of England service as you could ever imagine.

sentences.cn: 我对你的爱超乎想像.
sentences.en: I love you more than you could ever imagine.

sentences.cn: 他想像自己是诗人.
sentences.en: He imagines himse 1 f ( to be ) a poet.

sentences.cn: 我无法想像那样躺着的情形, 我会发疯的.
sentences.en: I can't imagine lying like that. I would go crazy.

sentences.cn: 他渴望工作, 因为没有工作,生活不可想像的.
sentences.en: He was eager for work, for he could not imagine life without it.

sentences.cn: 他生活在自己想像的虚幻世界里.
sentences.en: He lives in an unreal world imagined by himself.

sentences.cn: 她为自己想像中的侮辱而烦恼.
sentences.en: She stewed about an imagined insult.

sentences.cn: 宇宙的广大很难想像.
sentences.en: It is difficult to imagine the magnitude of the universe.

sentences.cn: 减肥有时并不像人们想像的那么困难.
sentences.en: Weight loss is not always as difficult as people imagine.

sentences.cn: 有句话就说,人类可以创造出任何想像得到的东西.
sentences.en: It has been said that man can create anything which he can imagine.

sentences.cn: 他们丝毫不受恐怖主义思潮的影响,这你可以想像到的.
sentences.en: They were as far removed from the ethos of terrorism as you could imagine.

sentences.cn: 我们料想每一个基督徒都要欢喜而且忠心的使用这个特权.
sentences.en: We should imagine that every Christian would use such a privilege gladly and faithfully.

sentences.cn: 这无疑是能够料想到的最无远见的政策.
sentences.en: This is surely the most shortsighted policy you could imagine.

sentences.cn: 我料想他明天会来.
sentences.en: I imagine he will come tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 他总是胡乱猜想我们在背后说他的闲话。
sentences.en: He's always imagining (that) we're talking about him behind his back.

sentences.cn: 我怎么也猜想不出究竟是谁在厨房里弄得叮叮当当地.
sentences.en: I couldn't imagine who was rattling around in the kitchen.

sentences.cn: 从引擎慢慢熄火的情况来看, 我猜想我们准是没汽油了.
sentences.en: The way the engine puttered out, I imagine that we are out of petrol.

sentences.cn: 我猜想所有地方都随时会下大雨.
sentences.en: I imagine everywhere gets a lot of rain from time to time.

sentences.cn: 我倒没象你那样喜欢他.但是我猜想他很行.
sentences.en: I didn't like him as much as you did. But I imagine he's very good.

sentences.cn: 我猜想她是个漂亮的姑娘.
sentences.en: I imagine her as a pretty girl.

sentences.cn: 我猜想这个手术大概需要一个小时左右吧.
sentences.en: I would imagine the operation will take about an hour.

sentences.cn: 杜洛埃猜想一定是自己误会了他朋友的话.
sentences.en: Drouet imagined that he must have misunderstood his friend.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 我猜想那些居民会顺利地扩展他们的小区.
sentences.en: I imagine its residents will succeed in expanding their community.

sentences.cn: 对于他锐利的凝视我几乎能猜想他能解读我的想法.
sentences.en: With his piercing gaze I almost imagined he could read my thoughts.

sentences.cn: 他猜想不是, 但是这样一肯定就使他放心了.
sentences.en: He imagined not; but this assurance relieved him.

sentences.cn: 我猜想你们其中一个船员在那下了船.
sentences.en: I imagine some of your crew may have jumped ship there.

sentences.cn: 没有人跟着我们——你只不过是猜想而已.
sentences.en: There's nobody following us — you're just imagining it!

sentences.cn: 我猜想她一个人过肯定很孤独。
sentences.en: I would imagine she's quite lonely living on her own.

sentences.cn: “他大怒。”“我想象得出。”
sentences.en: ‘He was furious. ’ ‘ I can imagine . ’

sentences.cn: 她想象着自己走进办公室，递上辞呈。
sentences.en: She imagined walking into the office and handing in her resignation.

sentences.cn: 你能想象得出干了20年之后被辞退会是什么样的滋味吗？
sentences.en: Can you imagine what it must be like to lose your job after 20 years?

sentences.cn: 这房子正是她所想象的。
sentences.en: The house was just as she had imagined it.

sentences.cn: 他想象不出比这更祥和的景象。
sentences.en: He could not imagine a more peaceful scene...

sentences.cn: 她无法想象住在那样一个地方。
sentences.en: She couldn't imagine living in a place like that...

sentences.cn: 里斯和安古莉娜等社会名流让养孩子变得光鲜亮丽，很难想象，有任会傻到仅仅受这些名流影响而生孩子——多数成年人其实懂得：养孩子不像剪头发那样简单。
sentences.en: It's hard to imagine that many people are dumb enough to want children just because Reese and Angelina make it look so glamorous: most adults understand that a baby is not a haircut.

sentences.cn: “三十年前，很难想象禁烟会出现在工作场所和酒吧，然而现在便是这样。我认为我们应该具有同样的勇气”
sentences.en: “Thirty years ago, it would have been inconceivable to have imagined a ban on smoking in the workplace or in pubs, and yet that is what we have now.

sentences.cn: 她还想象自己给出了巧妙的结案陈词，并赢得了官司。
sentences.en: She also imagined a skillful closing argument and a winning trial.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 幻想倾向是指想象和空想的倾向，而专注力是指让头脑专注于某事的倾向——注意力完全投入到感受和经历上。
sentences.en: Fantasy proneness could be considered a tendency to imagine and daydream,whereas absorption is the tendency to allow your mind to become absorbed in an activity – to pay complete attention to the sensations ( 感受) and the experiences.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: “ 想象一下，有将近 40个国家，你能记得那里的每一间画廊的每一面墙上挂着的每一幅画。”他说。
sentences.en: “Imagine being able to remember every painting, on every wall, in every gallery space, between nearly 40 countries,” he says.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我能想象出老师当时正在说什么或书本上有什么。”
sentences.en: I could imagine what the teacher was saying or what it looked like in the book.”
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我不能想象生活在没有国际化交流的职业环境和社会生活中。
sentences.en: I can’t imagine living my professional or social life without international interactions.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 你就像是生活在一个之前从来都无法想象的时代，而且那个时代也一去不复返。
sentences.en: It was like living in an age you could never have imagined, and that never has come back.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 事情并没有完全如我所想象的那样发展，但是我不会用现实所拥有的去换成想象中的样子。
sentences.en: Things haven't turned out exactly as I imagined， but I wouldn't change what I have now for that imaginary world
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 我喜欢跳舞， 我不能想象除此之外我这一生还能做些什么。
sentences.en: I can't imagine doing anything else with my life.
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 我发现很难想象让这样一个喜欢热热闹闹吃饭的民族放弃他们的习惯.
sentences.en: I found it odd to imagine a nation of convivial diners surrendering their birthright.

sentences.cn: 很难想象把老奶奶绑在离心机上保持肌肉会是什么情形.
sentences.en: It's hard to imagine sticking Grandma in a centrifuge to protect her muscle mass.

sentences.cn: 想象一下造访纽约,乘渡船去看自由女神像!
sentences.en: Imagine visiting New York and taking a ferry to the Statue of Liberty!

sentences.cn: 坦率地说我不能想象哪个经理能摆脱得了它.
sentences.en: Frankly I can not imagine how any manager can afford to get rid of it.

sentences.cn: 我晓得苗头不对, 我已经觉察出来了, 现在,情况比我想象的还坏.
sentences.en: I knew there was mischief brewing, I felt it, and now it's worse than I imagined.

sentences.cn: 你曾想象过的每一种美都是真实的,他此刻就在你心中.
sentences.en: Every beauty you've ever imagined is real and exists in you right now.

sentences.cn: 可以想象他们被逼着在这样的条件下建桥的情景.
sentences.en: Imagine being forced to build that in the condition they must be in.

sentences.cn: 这是你的同学根本无法想象的.
sentences.en: Horrors your classmates can scarcely imagine.

sentences.cn: 想象一下,一头驴与22匹马赛跑, 你一点机会都没有.
sentences.en: Imagine 22 horses and a donkey ( racing ), you just wouldn't stand a chance.

sentences.cn: 你不可能通过发明或凭空想象就能得到钱的.
sentences.en: You cannot get money by inventing or imagining it.

sentences.cn: 礼宾是一门学问,不像我们想象得那么简单.
sentences.en: How to receive guests decently is a knowledge which is not as easy as we imagine.

sentences.cn: 土地测量员K想象不出此外其它的任何焦虑能让他如此痛苦.
sentences.en: The Land Surveyor K. cannot imagine another anxiety than the one that is tormenting him.

sentences.cn: 记住, 你可不能将想象出的结果变为现实.
sentences.en: Remember, you can't bring into being what you can imagine.

sentences.cn: 多维空间的概念就是用来推测这些问题的解.
sentences.en: The concept of hyperspace is used to imagine these solutions.

Sentence.sentence: Imagine, for instance, that you lost your bank card.

Sentence.sentence: I could imagine what the teacher was saying or what it looked like in the book.

Sentence.sentence: Fantasy proneness could be considered a tendency to imagine and daydream, whereas absorption is the tendency to allow your mind to become absorbed in an activity – to pay complete attention to the sensations ( ' ,  感受) and the experiences.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It was like living in an age you could never have imagined, and that never has come back.

Sentence.sentence: They are effectively tackling real or imagined problems.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It seems higher education has become an industry of meeting-holders whose task it is to solve problems— real or imagined.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But how probable is it that someone will successfully jam their way into your home and steal your stuff?Let's imagine that you live in a small home with a wireless security setup that offers a functional anti-jamming system.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I can’t imagine living my professional or sociallife without international interactions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As he lay in the hospital recovering, Harper imagined a line of healthy frozen foods that tasted good.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As I began to read about scientists, economists, and philosophers, I started imagining myself in their shoes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Curmudgeons (倔脾气的人) who imagine that every renter is a murderer can still stay at conventional hotels.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Imagine the promise: Carrying all your textbooks in a 1.3 pound iPad?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And despite what you may believe about the limits of your own creative imaginations, we all have the potential to imagine the world in an absolutely new way.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Every major scientific discovery began with someone imagining the world to look differently from the way others saw it.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And this is what creativity is all about -- imagining the world in a new way
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As much as I enjoy my own company, I no longer imagine I can get through a single day much less all my life completely on my own.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I imagine that what my parents were trying to teach me was to take responsibilities for my actions and my choices
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But the teaching was shaped by our cultural imagines.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Imagine that someone in your neighborhood broke the law, and the judge put the whole neighborhood under suspicion.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "Imagine being able to remember every painting, on every wall, in every gallery space, between nearly 40 countries," he says.

Sentence.sentence: Fantasy proneness could be considered a tendency to imagine and daydream,whereas absorption is the tendency to allow your mind to become absorbed in an activity – to pay complete attention to the sensations and the experiences.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I can't imagine living my professional or social life without international interactions.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Imagine a world where building the tallest skyscraper wasn't a race of height, but rather one to collect the most solar energy.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Imagine you are wandering about on a Thai island or admiring the ruins of Angkor?
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Imagine you enter a car with no steering wheel, no brake or accelerator pedals.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: On the other hand, imagine the cost savings for local police enforcement and town budgets without all those speeding and parking tickets.

Sentence.sentence: You might imagine the job you'll get when you finish school.
